requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor exploring different stocks for potential investment.
user_goal: To find and view information about a specific stock by entering its name or code.

narrative_steps.title: Focusing the Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the search bar at the top. She clicks on it to begin her search.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar becomes focused, ready for input, with a blinking cursor.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Information
narrative_steps.description: Sarah types 'AAPL' into the search bar, hoping to learn more about Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The letters appear in the search bar with no errors or delays.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing the stock code, Sarah presses Enter to submit her query.
narrative_steps.action: Press the Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the input and retrieves data for AAPL stock from the API.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggest or autocomplete feature for stock search input
user_persona: An experienced trader who knows stock symbols but wants faster entry.
user_goal: To quickly select a known stock from auto-suggested results without fully typing the name.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Input
narrative_steps.description: Jake starts typing 'Tesla' into the search bar to find Tesla's stock details.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Tesla' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An autocomplete dropdown appears showing suggested matches like 'TSLA - Tesla Inc.'

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over Suggestions
narrative_steps.description: Jake hovers his mouse over the first suggestion to confirm it's correct before clicking.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the first item in the dropdown list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The hovered item is visually highlighted without triggering any action yet.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggested Stock
narrative_steps.description: Convinced he has the right match, Jake clicks on the suggestion to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'TSLA - Tesla Inc.' suggestion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar populates with 'TSLA', and the system initiates a search for Tesla stock.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company details and current price
user_persona: A casual investor checking quick facts about a newly discovered stock.
user_goal: To view essential company details and the current price after searching for a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Stock
narrative_steps.description: Maria searches for 'MSFT' to get an overview of Microsoft Corporation.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'MSFT' in the search bar and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system retrieves and displays Microsoft’s stock data.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Basic Info Card
narrative_steps.description: Maria looks at the card below the search bar to understand the basics about Microsoft.
narrative_steps.action: Visually scan the displayed card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Card shows company name, sector, industry, and current price clearly.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Additional Details
narrative_steps.description: Curious about extra metrics, Maria clicks on the card to see more insights.
narrative_steps.action: Click anywhere within the basic info card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional details such as market cap and P/E ratio are temporarily shown.

requirement_tested: Show market trend analysis with charts and historical data visualization
user_persona: A technical analyst evaluating past performance trends.
user_goal: To analyze how a stock performed historically using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Historical Chart
narrative_steps.description: Tom searches for 'GOOGL' and waits for the chart section to load.
narrative_steps.action: Search for 'GOOGL' and observe the chart area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive chart loads showing Google’s price movements over time.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Time Ranges
narrative_steps.description: Wanting a broader perspective, Tom selects a longer timeframe.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the '1Y' time range button above the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chart updates dynamically to show one year of historical data.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Data Points
narrative_steps.description: Tom hovers over a point on the chart to inspect exact values.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a specific point on the chart line.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip appears displaying date and precise stock value at that moment.

requirement_tested: Present financial data section with key metrics and ratios
user_persona: A fundamental analyst comparing financial health indicators.
user_goal: To review critical financial metrics for making informed investment decisions.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Financial Metrics Section
narrative_steps.description: Nina scrolls down after viewing the chart to locate the financial data table.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down to the financial data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tabular layout of key financial metrics is visible beneath the chart.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Key Ratios
narrative_steps.description: She reads through various metrics like EPS and ROE to assess profitability.
narrative_steps.action: Read through the listed financial metrics.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each metric includes name, numeric value, and appropriate unit for clarity.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Metric Definitions
narrative_steps.description: Unfamiliar with some terms, Nina clicks on a row to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Debt-to-Equity Ratio' row.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Expanded explanation or comparison data appears inline with the table.

requirement_tested: Offer customizable report format selection options
user_persona: A portfolio manager preparing tailored summaries for clients.
user_goal: To generate a professional-looking report in a preferred format.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Report Format
narrative_steps.description: Ethan wants a formal presentation and chooses a structured PDF format.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Standard PDF Report' radio button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Option gets selected, and the preview pane reflects the standard format style.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Format Preview
narrative_steps.description: He checks the preview to ensure the layout meets client expectations.
narrative_steps.action: Observe changes in the report preview panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Preview updates instantly to reflect the selected Standard PDF Report format.

requirement_tested: Include content selection interface for users to choose report sections
user_persona: A busy executive needing only core insights in reports.
user_goal: To include only necessary sections in generated reports to keep them concise.

narrative_steps.title: Disabling Unneeded Sections
narrative_steps.description: Claire doesn’t need sentiment analysis today, so she deselects that option.
narrative_steps.action: Click the toggle switch next to 'News Sentiment' to disable it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Checkbox unchonifies, and the section is excluded from future report generation.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Selections Before Generation
narrative_steps.description: Before generating, Claire verifies which sections are included.
narrative_steps.action: Review enabled checkboxes in the content selector.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only checked boxes represent sections that will appear in the final report.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user-selected criteria
user_persona: A researcher compiling periodic stock summaries for academic purposes.
user_goal: To compile a comprehensive report based on chosen settings for documentation.

narrative_steps.title: Finalizing Report Parameters
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Lee sets his desired format and content selections.
narrative_steps.action: Choose 'Detailed Analysis' format and enable all content sections except News Sentiment.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Settings are applied and reflected in the report preview.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Final Document
narrative_steps.description: Ready to document findings, Dr. Lee clicks the Generate button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Complete report compiles dynamically and displays in the preview panel.

requirement_tested: Enable report export functionality in multiple formats (PDF, Excel, etc.)
user_persona: An office worker sharing analytical reports with colleagues.
user_goal: To distribute the compiled report in a widely compatible file format.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Export Format
narrative_steps.description: Rey needs to send the report to team members who prefer Excel files.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export to Excel (.xlsx)' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Browser prompts Rey to download the Excel version of the report.

narrative_steps.title: Saving File Locally
narrative_steps.description: Rey saves the downloaded file to share later during the meeting.
narrative_steps.action: Save the downloaded .xlsx file to desktop.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: File saves successfully and remains intact for distribution.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A designer reviewing the visual consistency of the platform.
user_goal: To verify that the overall UI adheres to specified color guidelines.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Overall Layout
narrative_steps.description: Alex browses the homepage noting general background tones and accent colors.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the entire webpage visually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: White background dominates with navy-colored components like buttons and headers.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Alex inspects specific UI elements to confirm consistent styling.
narrative_steps.action: Focus attention on form inputs, navigation bars, and buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements maintain navy borders/text against white backgrounds.

requirement_tested: Provide real-time stock data updates and refresh capabilities
user_persona: A day trader monitoring live fluctuations closely.
user_goal: To stay informed of minute-by-minute changes in stock pricing.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Live Status Indicator
narrative_steps.description: Zara notices the green dot near the top indicating real-time data flow.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the status indicator in the header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Green dot confirms active connection to live stock data stream.

narrative_steps.title: Manually Triggering Refresh
narrative_steps.description: Wanting assurance, Zara manually refreshes the displayed data.
narrative_steps.action: Click the refresh button adjacent to the status indicator.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displayed data updates immediately reflecting latest market conditions.

requirement_tested: Include a dashboard overview showing multiple stocks at once
user_persona: A fund manager overseeing a diverse portfolio of holdings.
user_goal: To monitor all watched stocks efficiently on a centralized dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard View
narrative_steps.description: James logs in and navigates to the dashboard to see his tracked stocks.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the dashboard page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Grid of mini-cards representing each watched stock is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Drilling Into Specific Stock
narrative_steps.description: One card catches his eye due to significant percentage change.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the mini-card showing unusual activity.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page transitions to full detail view for the selected stock.

requirement_tested: Add filtering options for date ranges and specific data points
user_persona: A financial auditor validating quarterly earnings impacts.
user_goal: To isolate and examine stock behavior during a specific period.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Date Preset Filter
narrative_steps.description: Audrey needs to focus on last month's performance exclusively.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Last Month' from the preset filter dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chart and data tables update to show only events from the previous month.

narrative_steps.title: Using Custom Date Picker
narrative_steps.description: For precision, Audrey defines a narrower custom date range.
narrative_steps.action: Open the custom date picker and set both start and end dates.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected dates highlight the exact period of interest across visuals.

requirement_tested: Enable user authentication and profile management for saving preferences
user_persona: A frequent visitor aiming to retain personal configuration settings.
user_goal: To personalize and preserve frequently used report settings for reuse.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In to Save Preferences
narrative_steps.description: Oliver signs in to make sure his preferred settings remain saved.
narrative_steps.action: Log in using valid credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to dashboard with existing preferences pre-loaded.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Saved Settings
narrative_steps.description: After tweaking report settings, Oliver saves them permanently.
narrative_steps.action: Modify report format and click 'Save Preferences'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New preferences overwrite old ones and persist across sessions.

requirement_tested: Implement responsive design for desktop and mobile device compatibility
user_persona: A commuter checking stock updates on a smartphone during transit.
user_goal: To navigate and interact seamlessly regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Riley accesses the site on a phone to quickly check market status.
narrative_steps.action: Open the site on a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts automatically, stacking content vertically for easy scrolling.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Touch Controls
narrative_steps.description: Riley taps through menus and toggles without difficulty.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on menu icons and toggle switches.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Elements respond smoothly with adequate spacing suitable for touchscreens.
